author: Candle smart home
description: Control to your things from the internet. Encrypted, privacy friendly, and open source.
name: Candle web interface

Authorization token.description: To be allowed to get information on all your devices, you have to create an 'authorization' code. It's basically a very long password. You can generate it yourself under Settings -> Developer -> Create local authorization

Password.description: The password to be used in the web interface. Make sure it's secure, because it's used to encrypt your data.

Web location.description: The URL of the online location were you can access the web interface. You can use your own server if you prefer. The default is the Candle webserver: https://www.candlesmarthome.com/webinterface/

Debugging.description: Debugging allows you to diagnose any issues with the add-on. If enabled it will result in a lot more debug data in the internal log (which can be found under settings -> developer -> view internal logs).
